title: Lobo
description: In the tradition of classic Dog stories, 'Lobo' tells the tale of a German shepherd lost in the Urban Jungle of Monterrey, Mexico after the destruction of Hurricane Alex in June / July of 2010. Set against the background of current events and the crime wave sweeping Mexico, 'Lobo' is the story of one dog's struggle to return to his family.Show more Show less
author: David Gordon Burke
